bwwExcerpt: But the best thing about the show is Oklahoma native Keri Rene Fuller as Grizabella the Glamour Cat. Her portrayal of this broken-down, brokenhearted creature is maybe the best of the many I've seen, and the way she infuses the show's signature song with a real sense of anguish even as she rattled the rafters with some powerful singing, made her "Memory" truly live again.
